name: Galactic Senior Defense Squad
description:
Galactic Senior Defense Squad is a multiplayer action platformer that takes place in the distant future aboard the interplanetary-senior's-home/spaceship, The Incontinence.

Play as a crafty alien parasite trying to infect its way through the legions of helpless old folks, or as one of up to three nimble hunters tasked with trying to track it down and eliminate it.

As the parasite, you can pounce long distances and take over seniors' bodies, appearing indistinguishable from the uninfected ones. Use this to your advantage to evade capture!

As a hunters you can parkour yourself around the map using  a versatile set of movement options. Throw power orbs to propel yourself to light speeds and zap the parasite (or suspicious looking seniors)! Hunters will need to coordinate their searches and attacks to outrace the parasite's disgusting buffet!

Group up with 1-3 other friends and have fun pouncing, zapping, and infecting your way through the galaxy's finest geriatric supercruiser!

Controls:

Start with the tutorials to get a sense of each player type.
